text: This is working perfectly <@U22PJPGK0> . Thanks again.
I have another question about this variable {{ request.post_dict }} which suppose to get The POST data converted to a name->value dictionary
but if you post into a page on the COS it says that this is denied
correct, we don’t support POST requests
So what is the benefit of this variable {{ request.post_dict }} ?
good point. I’ll make sure it’s removed from the documentation. We did support POST a long time ago, but it’s a security risk
